# Automated Workflow with Snakemake

This simulated project shows a basic bioinformatics pipeline for read alignment and count generation using Snakemake.

**Tools Used**: Snakemake, Conda, bash scripting

## Objectives
- Build a Snakemake pipeline
- Define reproducible rules and environments
- Visualize pipeline graph
